hero.headline: I work in the dark arts.

projects.title: School for Good and Evil
projects.description: Worked directly with director Paul Fieg & the team at Fiegco to create a sizzle reel for pitching the film to Netflix.

projects.title: Borat Subsequent Moviefilm
projects.description: Worked directly with Sacha Baron Cohen to create a 10-minute sizzle/trailer which was used to sell the film to Amazon.

projects.title: Fear Street - Consulting & Feature Editorial
projects.description: Worked directly with director Leigh Janiak & the Fear Street post team to create main titles, recaps, and trailers for all 3 films.

projects.title: Detective Pikachu - Marketing
projects.description: Produced and edited this trailer, based on an idea from Ryan Reynolds. Legend says that he shed a single tear upon watching it.

projects.title: Detective Pikachu - Consulting
projects.description: Provided consultation on story, post-production, and marketing. Worked directly with director Rob Letterman & the team to build out the world of Detective Pikachu.

projects.title: Detective Pikachu - Social Media
projects.description: Edited this social promo for Ryan Reynolds' social media accounts.

projects.title: The Walking Dead - Marketing
projects.description: Produced and edited this 5-minute extended Comic-Con trailer for season 9 of The Walking Dead. Featuring custom score by Bear McCreary.

projects.title: Detective Pikachu - Marketing
projects.description: Produced this 'behind-the-scenes' featurette for Detective Pikachu. Visuals produced by MPC and Framestore and music produced by Karel Psota specifically for this piece.

projects.description: Produced and edited this trailer for season 4 of Fear The Walking Dead.

projects.description: Produced and edited this trailer for Season 4B of Fear The Walking Dead.

projects.description: Edited this teaser for The LEGO Batman Movie. Assembled from storyboards and previz/animatics. Animation was produced specifically for this teaser.

highlights.title: Archetype Creative
highlights.label: Entertainment
highlights.description: A full-service entertainment consultancy. Development, pre-production, post-production, & marketing services for filmmakers and production companies.

highlights.title: DharmaWorks
highlights.label: Publishing
highlights.description: A small collection of the world's best books on self-actualization. Learn how to live your personal legend.

highlights.title: Postmaker
highlights.label: Marketing Software
highlights.description: Create & schedule beautiful posts for social media in 30 seconds from your browser or on mobile.

highlights.title: PlatformKit
highlights.label: Open-Source Software
highlights.description: An open-source framework for running serverless API's & static sites on any cloud platform.

highlights.title: The Astrocast
highlights.label: Mobile App
highlights.description: Astrology for everybody. Featuring easy-to-understand daily forecasts, birth charts, & a podcast that makes astrology fun and accessible to beginners.

highlights.title: Pop Culture Alchemy
highlights.label: Clothing & Content
highlights.description: Clothing & content for modern mystics. Pop-culture references & sacred geometry, in a modern, minimal style.

highlights.title: The Time Traveler's Guide to the Apocalypse
highlights.label: Original Series
highlights.description: Dont stop the apocalypse. Pull the trigger. An original series based on the book by the same name. Currently in development.
